verses.verse: <S%G3767>Now<s%> when <S%G5347>Festus<s%> was <S%G1910>come<s%> into the <S%G1885>province<s%>, <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> he <S%G305>ascended<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2542>Caesarea<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%>.

<S%G1161>Then<s%> the high <S%G749>priest<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4413>chief<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G1718>informed<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3870>besought<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>,

And <S%G154>desired<s%> <S%G5485>favour<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G3704>that<s%> he would send <S%G3343>for<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%>, <S%G4160>laying<s%> <S%G1747>wait<s%> <S%G2596>in<s%> the <S%G3598>way<s%> to <S%G337>kill<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G3303%G3767>But<s%> <S%G5347>Festus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%>, that <S%G3972>Paul<s%> should be <S%G5083>kept<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2542>Caesarea<s%>, <S%G1161>and<s%> that he <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G3195>would<s%> <S%G1607%G1722>depart<s%> <S%G5034>shortly<s%> thither.

Let them <S%G3767>therefore<s%>, <S%G5346>said<s%> he, which <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> are <S%G1415>able<s%>, go down <S%G4782>with<s%> me, and <S%G2723>accuse<s%> <S%G846>this<s%> <S%G435>man<s%>, <S%G1536>if<s%> there <S%G2076>be<s%> any <S%G1536>wickedness<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5129>him<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> when he had <S%G1304>tarried<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G4119>more<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%>, he went <S%G2597>down<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G2542>Caesarea<s%>; and the next <S%G1887>day<s%> <S%G2523>sitting<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the judgment <S%G968>seat<s%> <S%G2753>commanded<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> to be <S%G71>brought<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> when <S%G846>he<s%> was <S%G3854>come<s%>, the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> which came <S%G2597>down<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> stood round <S%G4026>about<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5342>laid<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> and <S%G926>grievous<s%> <S%G157>complaints<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> they <S%G2480>could<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G584>prove<s%>.

While he <S%G626>answered<s%> for <S%G846>himself<s%>, <S%G3754%G3777>Neither<s%> <S%G1519>against<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%>, <S%G3777>neither<s%> <S%G1519>against<s%> the <S%G2411>temple<s%>, nor <S%G3777>yet<s%> <S%G1519>against<s%> <S%G2541>Caesar<s%>, have I <S%G264>offended<s%> any thing at <S%G5100>all<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G5347>Festus<s%>, <S%G2309>willing<s%> to <S%G2698>do<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> a <S%G5485>pleasure<s%>, <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%>, and <S%G2036>said<s%>, Wilt <S%G2309>thou<s%> go <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%>, and <S%G1563>there<s%> be <S%G2919>judged<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> these <S%G5130>things<s%> <S%G1909>before<s%> <S%G1700>me<s%>?

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%>, I <S%G1510%G2476>stand<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> <S%G2541>Caesar's<s%> judgment <S%G968>seat<s%>, <S%G3757>where<s%> <S%G3165>I<s%> <S%G1163>ought<s%> to be <S%G2919>judged<s%>: to the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> have I <S%G91>done<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G91>wrong<s%>, <S%G5613%G2532>as<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> very <S%G2566>well<s%> <S%G1921>knowest<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1487%G3303>if<s%> I be an <S%G91>offender<s%>, <S%G2532>or<s%> have <S%G4238>committed<s%> any <S%G5100>thing<s%> <S%G514>worthy<s%> of <S%G2288>death<s%>, I <S%G3868>refuse<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> to <S%G599>die<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> there <S%G2076>be<s%> <S%G3762>none<s%> of these <S%G3739>things<s%> whereof <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G2723>accuse<s%> <S%G3450>me<s%>, no <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G1410>may<s%> <S%G5483>deliver<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>. I appeal <S%G1941>unto<s%> <S%G2541>Caesar<s%>.

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G5347>Festus<s%>, when he had <S%G4814>conferred<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> the <S%G4824>council<s%>, <S%G611>answered<s%>, Hast thou appealed <S%G1941>unto<s%> <S%G2541>Caesar<s%>? <S%G1909>unto<s%> <S%G2541>Caesar<s%> shalt thou <S%G4198>go<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G1230>after<s%> <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G935>king<s%> <S%G67>Agrippa<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G959>Bernice<s%> <S%G2658>came<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G2542>Caesarea<s%> to <S%G782>salute<s%> <S%G5347>Festus<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G5613>when<s%> they had <S%G1304>been<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> <S%G4119>many<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%>, <S%G5347>Festus<s%> <S%G394>declared<s%> <S%G3972>Paul's<s%> <S%G2596>cause<s%> unto the <S%G935>king<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, There <S%G2076>is<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G435>man<s%> <S%G2641>left<s%> in <S%G1198>bonds<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G5344>Felix<s%>:

<S%G4012>About<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%>, <S%G1096>when<s%> <S%G3450>I<s%> <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G1519>at<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%>, the chief <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4245>elders<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G1718>informed<s%> me, <S%G154>desiring<s%> to have <S%G1349>judgment<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G4314>To<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> I <S%G611%G3754>answered<s%>, It <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> the <S%G1485>manner<s%> of the <S%G4514>Romans<s%> to <S%G5483>deliver<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G684>die<s%>, <S%G4250>before<s%> <S%G2228>that<s%> he which is <S%G2723>accused<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> the <S%G2725>accusers<s%> face to <S%G2596%G4383%G5037>face<s%>, and <S%G2983>have<s%> <S%G5117>licence<s%> to answer for <S%G627>himself<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> the crime laid against <S%G1462>him<s%>.

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%>, when <S%G846>they<s%> were <S%G4905>come<s%> <S%G1759>hither<s%>, <S%G4160>without<s%> <S%G3367>any<s%> <S%G311>delay<s%> on the <S%G1836>morrow<s%> I <S%G2523>sat<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the judgment <S%G968>seat<s%>, and <S%G2753>commanded<s%> the <S%G435>man<s%> to be brought <S%G71>forth<s%>.

<S%G4012>Against<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> when the <S%G2725>accusers<s%> stood <S%G2476>up<s%>, they <S%G2018>brought<s%> <S%G3762>none<s%> <S%G156>accusation<s%> of such things <S%G3739>as<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G5282>supposed<s%>:

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G2213>questions<s%> <S%G4314>against<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> their <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G1175>superstition<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>, which was <S%G2348>dead<s%>, <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G5335>affirmed<s%> to be <S%G2198>alive<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> because <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G639>doubted<s%> <S%G1519>of<s%> <S%G5127>such<s%> <S%G4012>manner<s%> of <S%G2214>questions<s%>, I <S%G3004>asked<s%> him <S%G1487>whether<s%> he <S%G1014>would<s%> <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%>, and <S%G2546>there<s%> be <S%G2919>judged<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> these <S%G5130>matters<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> when <S%G3972>Paul<s%> had <S%G1941>appealed<s%> to be <S%G5083%G846>reserved<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> the <S%G1233>hearing<s%> of <S%G4575>Augustus<s%>, I <S%G2753>commanded<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> to be <S%G5083>kept<s%> <S%G2193%G3739>till<s%> I might <S%G3992>send<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G2541>Caesar<s%>.

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G67>Agrippa<s%> <S%G5346>said<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G5347>Festus<s%>, I <S%G1014>would<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G191>hear<s%> the <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G846>myself<s%>. To <S%G839%G1161>morrow<s%>, <S%G5346>said<s%> he, thou shalt <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

And on the <S%G1887>morrow<s%>, <S%G3767>when<s%> <S%G67>Agrippa<s%> was <S%G2064>come<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G959>Bernice<s%>, <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G5325>pomp<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> was <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the place of <S%G201>hearing<s%>, <S%G4862%G5037>with<s%> the chief <S%G5506>captains<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2596%G1851>principal<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> <S%G5607>of<s%> the <S%G4172>city<s%>, <S%G2532>at<s%> <S%G5347>Festus'<s%> <S%G2753>commandment<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> was brought <S%G71>forth<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G5347>Festus<s%> <S%G5346>said<s%>, <S%G935>King<s%> <S%G67>Agrippa<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> are here <S%G4840>present<s%> with <S%G2254>us<s%>, ye <S%G2334>see<s%> this <S%G5126>man<s%>, <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4128>multitude<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> have <S%G1793>dealt<s%> with <S%G3427>me<s%>, <S%G5037>both<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> also <S%G1759>here<s%>, <S%G1916>crying<s%> that he <S%G1163>ought<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> to <S%G2198>live<s%> any <S%G3371>longer<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> when <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G2638>found<s%> that <S%G846>he<s%> had <S%G4238>committed<s%> <S%G3367>nothing<s%> <S%G514>worthy<s%> of <S%G2288>death<s%>, <S%G2532%G1161>and<s%> that he <S%G846>himself<s%> hath <S%G5127>appealed<s%> <S%G1941>to<s%> <S%G4575>Augustus<s%>, I have <S%G2919>determined<s%> to <S%G3992>send<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G4012>Of<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G804>certain<s%> <S%G5100>thing<s%> to <S%G1125>write<s%> unto my <S%G2962>lord<s%>. <S%G1352>Wherefore<s%> I have <S%G4254>brought<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G4254>forth<s%> <S%G1909>before<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3122>specially<s%> <S%G1909>before<s%> <S%G4675>thee<s%>, O <S%G935>king<s%> <S%G67>Agrippa<s%>, <S%G3704>that<s%>, after <S%G351>examination<s%> <S%G1096>had<s%>, I might <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5100>somewhat<s%> to <S%G1125>write<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> it <S%G1380>seemeth<s%> to <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G249>unreasonable<s%> to <S%G3992>send<s%> a <S%G1198>prisoner<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> not <S%G3361>withal<s%> to <S%G4591>signify<s%> the <S%G156>crimes<s%> laid <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.
